title: The Source Presents Hip Hop Hits Volume 8 (2004) 320kbps
description:
Album Info 

The eighth volume of the Hip Hop Hits series, presented by Source magazine, covers major rap singles from the latter half of 2003 and early 2004. These discs are never intended to be complete, since you'd need a few volumes to cover all the notable singles released during the span of a year. Some odd choices are made, such as T.I.'s "Be Easy" instead of the much bigger hit "Rubber Band Man," but there are plenty of memorable inclusions. Kanye West's "Through the Wire," J-Kwon's "Tipsy," Chingy's "Right Thurr," "Damn" by YoungbloodZ, and "Can't Stop, Won't Stop" by Young Gunz are the highlights. 


Track Listing 


    01 Damn! - YoungBloodZ
    02 The Industry - Wyclef Jean
    03 Right Thurr - Chingy
    04 Can't Stop, Won't Stop - Young Gunz
    05 Gangsta Nation - Nate Dogg and Westside Connection
    06 Clap Back - Ja Rule
    07 Through the Wire - Kanye West
    08 Skills - Gang Starr
    09 Tipsy - J-Kwon
    10 Quarterbackin' - Clipse and E-40
    11 Into You - Fabolous and Tamia
    12 Be Easy - T.I.
    13 Hotel - R. Kelly and Cassidy
    14 Salt Shaker - Ying Yang Twins Feat. Lil' Jon & East Side Boyz
    15 Recognize - Scarface
    16 Bonus: Relationships (With Me and My Gun) - Benzino and Untouchables
